Introduction

Nam Do Hyon is a South Korean Singer under MBK Entertainment. He was first known for participating in the survival show Under Nineteen.

In 2019, he appeared and competed in Produce X 101 where he ranked 8th on the final episode, making him the youngest member of the boy group X1.

Following the disbandment of X1 in 2020, Dohyon debuted once again as part of the duo H&D with his fellow member and labelmate Lee Hangyul.

On November 19, 2020, he debuted as a member of BAE173 with the mini album "Intersection: Spark."

On April 28, 2023, it was revealed that he filed an injunction to suspend his exclusive contract with his agency, Pocketdol Studio. On June 22, it was announced that he won the lawsuit, leaving the agency and the BAE173.

Dohyon is now a soloist under the name toni rei.
